product_name: Columbia Benton Springs Fleece Jacket - Girls' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Designed for adventures that take her deep into the wilderness or just down the street, the girls' Benton Springs Fleece Jacket from Columbia offers warmth and comfort she'll love. Breathable, quick-drying and non-pilling polyester fleece offers warmth while remaining lightweight. Zippered hand pockets warm chilled fingers. Columbia Benton Springs Fleece Jacket features a full-zip front with a stand-up collar. Closeout.
short_description: Designed for adventures that take her deep into the wilderness or just down the street, the girls' Benton Springs Fleece Jacket from Columbia offers warmth and comfort she'll love.
